basic.description: This course, taught primarily in German, presents a survey of one topic in the area of German studies. Topics may include themes from art, music, or literature placed in a cultural and historical perspective. Topics will change frequently. May be repeated to a maximum of six semester hours with permission of instructor.
basic.subject: GER
basic.title: Topics in German Studies

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: GER 2220 or instructor permission. GER 3500 or GER 3310 are recommended.
